1.text: Before I give you a little more space to adjust there's one thing you need to learn.

2.text: Just ONE?!?!?! You STILL haven't answered any of my questions Pickles (if that is even your real name).

3.text: In due time, kid... In due time.

4.text: Look I just want to make sure you don't die. Press the attack button to take out your bow. Not everyone is looking out for you like me.

5.text: .... Bow? I've never shot anything more dangerous that a turkey baster before.

6.text: You're gonna be a natural. Trust me.
